title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Hike Locations
body: Hike Locations             Maintained Trails:  River Mountains Loop Trail Historic Railroad Trail  Unmaintained Routes:  Bluffs Trail Grapevine Canyon Trail (to petroglyphs) North Shore Summit Trail Redstone Trail St. Thomas Trail (accessibility varies do to fluctuating water levels) Wetlands Trail (Note: Portions of this trail are closed until October 31, 2014. Link: News Release) Arizona Hot Spring/White Rock Canyon/Liberty Bell Arch (Not recommended during summer months) Fortification Hill
